holidays.title: International Day of Remembrance and Tribute to the Victims of Terrorism
holidays.description: Today, we remember those who have died as a result of terrorism and honor the survivors.

holidays.title: Internet Self-Care Day
holidays.description: The internet is full of information. Use that information for some self-care today.

holidays.title: National Brazilian Blowout Day
holidays.description: Let's get ready to protect our hair from the scorching heat of the summer!

holidays.title: National Report Upcoding Fraud Day
holidays.description: Let’s stand up and speak out against unethical behavior when we see it.

holidays.title: National Senior Citizens Day
holidays.description: For all they have achieved for the good of their communities, senior citizens deserve our thanks!

holidays.title: National Spumoni Day
holidays.description: Enjoy a taste or two of this delicious layered Italian ice cream dessert.

holidays.title: Ninoy Aquino Day
holidays.description: This day forever commemorates the life and legacy of a beloved hero of freedom.

holidays.title: Hayden Panettiere’s Birthday
holidays.description: Acting is in her blood, and she’s not about to stop anytime soon.

holidays.title: Joe Strummer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Strummer was a British musician whose career spanned more than two decades.

holidays.title: Kyle Creek’s Birthday
holidays.description: After years of anonymity, Kyle Creek finally steps into the light to share his incredible story.

holidays.title: Timmy Thick’s Birthday
holidays.description: This internet star and social media personality is one upload away from enviable success.

holidays.title: Usain Bolt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although retired, his record as a sprinter remains unbeaten; ‘Lightning Bolt’ will never be forgotten
